Package dao

Class EventDao

java.lang.Object
dao.EventDao
public class EventDao extends Object
Event data access class. Interacts with the database.

  • Method Details

    • createEvent

      public void createEvent(String eventId, String associatedUsername, String personID, float latitude, float longitude, String country, String city, String eventType, int year)
      Create a new event in the Event table in the database
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID associated with the event
      associatedUsername - Username of person to which this event belongs
      personID - ID of person of event
      latitude - Latitude of where the event occurred
      longitude - Longitude of where the event occurred
      country - Country in where the event occurred
      city - City in where the event occurred
      eventType - The type of event that occurred
      year - The year the even occurred
